channel.title: Blog on Prakash Paudel
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Prakash Paudel

item.title: Arsène Wenger
item.description: Last week, Arsène Wenger managed his last game for Arsenal Football Club. He’s been manager of the team for 22 years. I want to write a bit about what it’s been like to follow Arsenal and Monsieur Wenger all these years. As a young kid growing up in Asia, becoming an Arsenal fan was by chance. I didn’t have any connection to the club. I just watched whatever match was on TV.

item.title: Google's Phone AI
item.description: Last week, google showed off a really cool demo phone call. Google’s AI called a hair salon to setup an appointment. It went something like this: AI: Hello, I'd like to make a hair appointment for my client for, umm, the Wednesday the 7th for 12pm. Salon (Actual person): Ok. Give me oneee second. AI: mmhhmm Salon: We don't have anything for 12, we do have a 1:15. AI: Umm, I'm looking for something between 10-12 actually.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my personal site. It’s built with hugo, a nifty framework for generating static sites.
